GSD.description:
USB: host: isp116x: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 82a101f14943f479fd190b1e5b40d91c77e2ac1b. For more details please see the references link.
